name: Champion
description: Fighters who focus on raw physical power and athletic excellence.

3.Improved Critical: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
3.Remarkable Athlete: Add half your Proficiency Bonus (rounded up) to Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution checks you make that don't already use your Proficiency Bonus. When you make a running long jump, the distance you can cover increases by a number of feet equal to your Strength modifier.

7.Additional Fighting Style: Choose a second Fighting Style from the Fighter class.

10.Heroic Champion: Your Remarkable Athlete benefits now apply to Initiative rolls. You gain Proficiency in Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution saves (choose one).

15.Superior Critical: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

18.Survivor: At the start of each of your turns, you regain Hit Points equal to 5 + Constitution modifier if you have no more than half your Hit Points left. You don't gain this benefit if you have 0 Hit Points.
